import React, { useState } from 'react' import './NewEvent.css'; import FileBase from 'react-file-base64'; function NewEvent() { const [eventData, setEventData] = useState({ creator: '', title: '', description: '', tags: '', image: '', date: ''}); return (

Creating an Event

setEventData({ ...eventData, creator: e.target.value })} />
setEventData({ ...eventData, title: e.target.value })} />
setEventData({ ...eventData, description: e.target.value })} />
setEventData({ ...eventData, tags: e.target.value })} />
setEventData({ ...eventData, date: e.target.value })} />
setEventData({...eventData,image:base64})} />
) } export default NewEvent
